programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: The program reviews the latest news and developments aboutfilms, interviews with new stars, and fashion in the American film capital.

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Four childhood friends are reunited when the group's swornbachelor decides to get married. As they head to Las Vegas to relieve their glory days, they realize how much the Sin City has transformed.

programme.title: The Upside
programme.desc: The essentially different lives of a wealthy man withquadriplegia and an unemployed man are intertwined when the latter works for the former, and their encounter proves that human lives cannot be lived in isolation, as both men change one another in ways beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Scoop Maa Raya
programme.desc: The Lebanese presenter Raya Abirached reviews the latestfilms shown in American cinema and the changes that occur in them weekly. She also reveals the latest news of Hollywood celebs and their accessories and covers the most important international festivals.

programme.title: Mr. Jones
programme.desc: Gareth Jones is a Welsh journalist who just happens to be inthe Soviet Union during the time of the man-made Holodomor famine that ended the life of millions of people, as he grows determined to uncover the truth behind the famine, even if he loses his life for it.

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Following the Battle of Gallipoli in 1919, an Australianfarmer decides to head to Turkey in order to locate his three missing sons there, after he promised his wife to give them a proper burial.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sentto a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossiblemission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: During the final chapter of WWII, Wardaddy, an inured armysergeant, leads a group of soldiers on a risky mission behind enemy lines. With the odds against them, Wardaddy and his crew go through hell as they attempt to carry out their heroic mission.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Bridget Cardigan has an easy life, until her husband, Don,loses his high-paying job, and she is forced to work to pay off his debts. She finds a job as a cleaner at the Federal Reserve Bank in Kansas, leading her to come up with a plan to steal some money in order to keep her house, together with her colleagues Nina and Jackie.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Upside
programme.desc: The essentially different lives of a wealthy man withquadriplegia and an unemployed man are intertwined when the latter works for the former, and their encounter proves that human lives cannot be lived in isolation, as both men change one another in ways beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny (Adam Sandler) decides to take his family back to hishometown where he grew up with his friends, and throughout the film, Lenny and his friends believe their kids are still children, but they eventually accept the idea that they have grown up and learn from them.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sentto a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: The program reviews the latest news and developments aboutfilms, interviews with new stars, and fashion in the American film capital.

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Following the Battle of Gallipoli in 1919, an Australianfarmer decides to head to Turkey in order to locate his three missing sons there, after he promised his wife to give them a proper burial.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: During the final chapter of WWII, Wardaddy, an inured armysergeant, leads a group of soldiers on a risky mission behind enemy lines. With the odds against them, Wardaddy and his crew go through hell as they attempt to carry out their heroic mission.

programme.title: Blended
programme.desc: After their blind date goes horribly bad, Jim and Laurendecide they should never see each other again, until they get stuck with their respective kids at a family resort.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: When his wife passes away a day after his baby girl is born,a father must struggle to bring up his child as a single dad, and this unique experience teaches him a lot more about himself, the world, and what fatherhood really means.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: A mother lives a near-perfect life, but the progress of hercareer is frustrating even though she works double effort and is highly committed. With all the frustrations she faces, she gets to know a group of other mothers with whom she tries to overcome routine.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Amy, Kiki, and Carla are three under-appreciated andover-burdened mothers who are trying to cope with their lives when their scary mothers come to visit them for Christmas, bringing the three of them into a new challenge to celebrate Christmas the way they prefer.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: A pot dealer enlists a stripper and two teenage misfits topose as his fake suburban family in order to pull off a drug smuggling scheme across the Mexican border.

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Following the Battle of Gallipoli in 1919, an Australianfarmer decides to head to Turkey in order to locate his three missing sons there, after he promised his wife to give them a proper burial.

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossiblemission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.

programme.title: Mr. Jones
programme.desc: Gareth Jones is a Welsh journalist who just happens to be inthe Soviet Union during the time of the man-made Holodomor famine that ended the life of millions of people, as he grows determined to uncover the truth behind the famine, even if he loses his life for it.

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: The film focuses on the life of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.,in 1965 when he led marches from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama to demand equal voting rights. As the demonstrators faced the police forces, and after many hit-and-run ,their number began to increase in a way that could not be confronted with violence.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: When his wife passes away a day after his baby girl is born,a father must struggle to bring up his child as a single dad, and this unique experience teaches him a lot more about himself, the world, and what fatherhood really means.

programme.title: Downton Abbey: A New Era
programme.desc: A continuation of the events after the first film, as theCrawley family returns with new secrets and stories are revealed.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington follows the comic misadventures of a youngPeruvian bear with a passion for all things British, who travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he begins to realise that city life is not all he had imagined - until he meets the kindly Brown family, who read the label around his neck ('Please look after this bear. Thank you.') and offer him a temporary haven. It looks as though his luck has changed until this rarest of bears catches the eye of a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family inWindsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challengesthrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadine's brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: A program that is shown every Sunday, covering news from theworld of Hollywood. It also provides scenes of films, revenues, and many topics and news of interest to cinema lovers around the world.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: In a struggling burlesque club that is teetering on the edgeof closing, the owner, Tess, finds a possible saving grace in the arrival of Ali, a small-town girl who possesses a tremendous talent that she soon becomes the club's main attraction.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: Luke finds himself responsible for the safety of 12-year-oldMei, who is pursued by the Chinese Triads and a group of Russians, for possessing priceless top-secret information in the form of numerical codes. While on the run, Luke decides that he will protect the little Mei at any cost.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: When Jimmy Monroe decides to sell a precious baseball cardin order to get the necessary money for his daughterâ€™s wedding, the card gets stolen, and Jimmy recruits his fellow cop Peter to find the thief who turns out to be a football-memorabilia-obsessed gangster.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of WWII, the desperate Nazis summon a creaturefrom the depth of Hell to serve as a Nazi weapon. When US forces seize the half-blooded demon, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm takes him in and raises him to be a part of an elite supernatural team that defends the world against forces of evil.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skillsto their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: With Tony Stark keeping an eye on him, Peter struggles tolive up to his mantle as a superhero and reconcile the responsibility with his ordinary life as a high school student. But when a new villain appears with advanced weapons, Peter has to face a threat to everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that arepremiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: After his battle in Metropolis, Bruce Wayne believes thatSuperman must be stopped, as the evil Lex Luthor manipulates Batman into defeating the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: One of the countless symbiotes that have invaded Earth, analien creature, bonds with a failed reporter. However, the creature grows fond of Earth and chooses to defend it.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: As a bunch of mercenaries storms the residence of a richfamily on Christmas Eve, it's up to Santa Claus to save the day.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: In the wake of a terrible tragedy, a failure of justice setsRiley North on a course to take the law into her own hands. She has spent five years getting ready to take her revenge. Woe betide anyone who has wronged her.

A highly intelligent student wants to enroll in Harvard, butdoesn't have the tuition fees. He moves with his friends to Las Vegas, where they us their card counting skills to win large amounts of cash in the casinos of the city.

programme.desc: With Tony Stark keeping an eye on him, Peter struggles tolive up to his mantle as a superhero and reconcile the responsibility with his ordinary life as a high school student. programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: The tough CIA agent JJ finds himself at the mercy of thewitty 9-year-old girl Sophie, after he is secretly sent to monitor her family.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man in the city of Brooklyn,reflecting the possibilities and abilities of the Spider-Man world, where more than one person can wear a mask and do whatever he likes, whether good or evil.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four youngsters are trapped in the Jumanji jungle world astheir avatars when they use a magical video game to play, and they have to complete the game to get back to reality.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When a depressed Spencer starts fiddling with the brokenJumanji game in search of purpose, his friends reenter the game to rescue him, along with his grandfather and his old friend. As they encounter a landscape ravaged by drought, they must fight to find Spencer and save Jumanji.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A mother is forced to move with her son, from the UnitedStates to live in China. He's embraced by a Kung Fu master who teaches him all the secrets of the game and changes his life, and the life of his mother for the better.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: After his wife is killed, a cop who works for TimeEnforcement Commission finds himself forced to go back in time to face a corrupt politician.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santa ,also known as Nicholas,has his brother Fred Clausmoving in with him to the North Pole. Throughout Santa's life, he is always the giving role model while his brother is the complete opposite , living in his shadow all his life. With Christmas getting closer,can he turn things around?

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: Peter goes to Hawaii on vacation to try to forget hisgirlfriend the TV star Sarah, who ended their relationship a short time ago, only to find her staying in the same resort with her new boyfriend.
